mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Trailer Life", "Big Events of 1977", "National Square Dance Convention", and "The Callers' Textbook". This edition also includes the regular features entitled "Hot Line-Late News", "As I See It", "Discovery", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Contra Corner", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
